name: Simply Solitaire
synopsis: Simply Solitaire gives you exactly what you want: pure Solitaire on your Nintendo DSi system! Solitaire, also called patience, is a single-player card game involving a layout of cards with a goal of sorting them. Solitaire games involve dealing cards from a shuffled deck into a prescribed arrangement on a table-top, from which the player attempts to reorder the deck by suit and rank through a series of moves transferring cards from one place to another. The simple game design and easy, intuitive controls make it a game that the whole family can enjoy. The game has 50 puzzles in each level to guarantee hours of gameplay fun.
